lines: 1. Light of light, enlighten me Now anew the day is dawning; Sun of grace, the shadows flee; Brighten Thou my Sabbath morning; With Thy joyous sunshine blest, Happy is my day of rest.
2. Let me with my heart today, Holy, holy-, holy, singing, Rapt awhile from earth away, All my soul to Thee up springing, Have a foretaste inward given How they worship Thee in heaven.
3. Hence all care, all vanity! For the day to God is holy; Come, Thou glorious Majesty, Deign to fill this temple lowly; Nought today my soul shall move, Simply resting in Thy love.
